title: Seldarine Drow
content:
They can cast it once, regained on a long rest, and charisma is their spellcasting ability for this spell.

Drow gain access to this spell at level 5. They can cast it once, regained on a long rest, and charisma is their spellcasting ability for this spell.

Seldarine Drow Tips & Notes

During Early Access, the Drow race, including the subrace Seldarine Drow, used to feature +2 Dexterity and +1 Charisma. This has been changed in the full launch of BG3 and the Ability Score points are now associ
